directoryOverview: Web/DutyHours contains pages for ACGME-compliant duty hours tracking. Residents log work hours, programs monitor compliance with 80-hour work week rules, and administrators generate compliance reports.
keyWorkflows: External scheduling system synchronization (AMION, QGenda, Lightning Bolt, Momentum)
Rotation block and rotation name management
BSN nursing program clinical learning hours
Record of rotations and rotators reporting
